column1: #Text=" Aang says : " In my dream , we were right in the middle of the invasion , and you had to stop to use the bathroom !
#Text=We died because of your tiny bladder .
#Text=And you need to start wearing your hair up .
#Text=In my dream , your hair got caught in a train , and - .
#Text=I know you 're just trying to help , but you really need to get a grip .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's like every time I think about how stressed I am , I just end up more stressed .
#Text=I 'm like a big growing snowball of nerves .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Of course you are .
#Text=That 's 'cause you got ta fight the Fire Lord , the baddest man on the planet .
#Text=And you better win or we 're all done for .
#Text=" Katara says : " You know what , I 've got just the thing !
